chapter.title: Quick access to cards
chapter.p: Access to a card quickly and from anywhere in Mingle.

topic.title: Quick card view via full text search
topic.item: You can simply put a pound (#) followed by a card number you want to open in a text search area.

topic.title: Quick card view via Firefox quick search

steps.item: To setup a quick card search, open Firefox and go to Mingle full text search box at the top right corner.
Right-click inside the search input box and choose "Add a Keyword for this Search..."
Enter a title for the search (i.e. "Mingle Quick Search") and a keyword you'll use to execute it, such as "mingle"
Press 'Add' and your Mingle quick search is setup
Now, from the Firefox address bar, you can type in "mingle" plus your search query such as "#100" to go directly to specific card in your project

topic.hint: You can use the Firefox quick search to search any content in Mingle. Just replace #100 with your query.
